original:
Damien Hirst is known for his conceptual design in artwork, often delegating the actual creation of many pieces to skilled artisans. His prominence in the art world is largely attributed to his ability to generate provocative concepts. In contemporary art, the production process frequently involves the assembly of found objects, a practice that has become a hallmark of conceptual art.
